What is your overall assessment of this course

Comments_Questions: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course
Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved

How would you summarize this course for a fellow student?  Would you recommend it to another student?  Why or why not
Comments_List:
Strengths: 
- went over basic professional communication tools that many students definitely needed to learn. 

Weaknesses: 
- hard to engage all students (especially b/c it was at 6-8pm)

Strengths:
- went over basic concepts of professional communication everyone should learn
- many opportunities for feedback

Weaknesses:
- bad timing (6-8 pm on a Thursday night?!)
This course is useful and covers many interesting topics in career development. The coaches are all approachable and gives all of us detailed feedback.
the most useful professional skills class I have ever taken

This course provides excellent, one-on-one professional skills training. The hands-on sessions were the most valuable; the lectures towards the beginning of the course could be omitted or modified to include more hands-on exercises.

William was only helpful if you wanted him to be. As in, if students were checked out, they probably complained about this course a lot; whereas, if students were actually interested in learning professional communication skills, he was great.

William was really helpful, but only if you wanted him to be. What I mean by that is that some students really complained about this seminar, but I really do think everyone should have taken in more seriously especially with the help of William.
Clear and passionate about the work
The instructor is approachable and introduces useful skills in an easy-to-understand manner.
Very helpful and beneficial to do before internship interviews and such. If you put the effort in youll see results!
highly underrated course. Even if it's a requirement, students need to take the materials learned in this course to heart.
I would recommend it to a student with relevant interests.

teach proper writing, communicating and interview skills through lots of practise
yes it is useful
A required class for MPH students that for the most part is very helpful.
